attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1642

Date: 2008-09-05

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, thinking it necessary, hereby advises, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, pursuant to subsection 54(2) of the Federal Courts Act, that Commissions do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering each of the persons whose name is set out in the annexed Schedule to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, in or outside Canada in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the Federal Court of Appeal or the Federal Court.


SCHEDULE

 

 

 

Hélène Boudreau-Laforge                    Dundee, New Brunswick

Guylaine Champagne              Edmonton, Alberta

Martine-Aimée Daigneault                   Montréal, Quebec

Vanessa George                                 Ajax, Ontario

Abigail Grimes                         Bowmanville, Ontario

Yoginder Gulia                         Mississauga, Ontario

Marion Kelly                                         Regina, Saskatchewan

Elaine Kokoski                         Pilot Butte, Saskatchewan

Serge Laforge                         Dundee, New Brunswick

Maggie Lau                                          Richmond Hill, Ontario

Colinne Martin                         Ottawa, Ontario

Julie Mullin                                           Fredericton, New Brunswick

Shaun Nelson                          Markham, Ontario

Danielle Parent                                    Ottawa, Ontario

Alice Prodan Gil                                   Toronto, Ontario

Jean-Pierre Roussain              Montréal, Quebec

Jena Russell                                        Ajax, Ontario

Velma Szatkowski                                Regina, Saskatchewan

Barbara Tanasychuk                           Toronto, Ontario

Sandy Wilson                                       Milton, Ontario

Kathie Woodcox                                   Guelph, Ontario

Dina Zigomanis                                 Ajax, Ontario


Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice et en vertu du paragraphe 54(2) de la Loi sur les Cours fédérales, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil, le jugeant nécessaire, recommande que des commissions soient émises, sous le grand sceau du Canada, habilitant chacune des personnes dont le nom figure à l’annexe ci-jointe, à faire prêter serment et à recevoir des affidavits et des déclarations ou affirmations solennelles au Canada ou à l’étranger, lors de toute procédure actuelle ou éventuelle devant la Cour d’appel fédérale ou la Cour fédérale.


ANNEXE

 

 

 

Hélène Boudreau-Laforge                Dundee (Nouveau-Brunswick)

Guylaine Champagne                       Edmonton (Alberta)

Martine-Aimée Daigneault               Montréal (Québec)

Vanessa George                              Ajax (Ontario)

Abigail Grimes                                  Bowmanville (Ontario)

Yoginder Gulia                                   Mississauga (Ontario)

Marion Kelly                                       Régina (Saskatchewan)

Elaine Kokoski                                  Pilot Butte (Saskatchewan)

Serge Laforge                                   Dundee (Nouveau-Brunswick)

Maggie Lau                                       Richmond Hill (Ontario)

Colinne Martin                                   Ottawa (Ontario)

Julie Mullin                                         Frédéricton (Nouveau-Brunswick)

Shaun Nelson                                    Markham (Ontario)

Danielle Parent                                 Ottawa (Ontario)

Alice Prodan Gil                                Toronto (Ontario)

Jean-Pierre Roussain                      Montréal (Québec)

Jena Russell                          Ajax (Ontario)

Velma Szatkowski                            Régina (Saskatchewan)

Barbara Tanasychuk                        Toronto (Ontario)

Sandy Wilson                                    Milton (Ontario)

Kathie Woodcox                               Guelph (Ontario)

Dina Zigomanis                                 Ajax (Ontario)
